name: capacitor-wallet-access
description: Used to gain access to a user's wallet on their device. This allows access to the cards, passes, or tickets a user will have in their wallet, but this does NOT include the capacity to create new passes
author: Nick Lanese

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin -destination generic/platform=iOS && cd ..
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- --fix --format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js
